contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 18, 2015 D Auckland Band Association (B Section)
Auckland Band Association (B Section) 1 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Auckland Band Association Contest auckland-band-association-b-section
None
Entertainments Contest
Hawkins Theatre, Papakura, Auckland, New Zealand Sacred Item – ABA Slow Item Cup: 1st: Howick Brass, 2nd: Kumeu Brass, 3rd: North Shore Brass Academy Major Work – ABA Own Choice Selection Cup: 1st: Howick Brass, 2nd: Kumeu Brass, 3rd: North Shore Brass Academy March – ABA Stage March Cup: 1st: Howick Brass, 2nd: Kumeu Brass, 3rd: North Shore Brass Academy Solo – Gilbert Morrison Trophy: Winner: Jake Krishnamurti of Kumeu Brass
Light Music – Chummy Rowe Memorial Cup: 1st: Howick and Kumeu Brass, 2nd: North Shore Brass Academy Public Appeal – J.R Williamson Memorial Cup: 1st: Kumeu Brass, 2nd: Howick Brass and North Shore Brass Academy Aggregate – Vern Hogg Memorial Cup: 1st: Howick Brass, 2nd: Kumeu Brass, 3rd: North Shore Brass Academy
Peter Mason Trophy - Best Compere in A and B Section: Emily Sullivan, North Shore Brass Academy
Oct. 27, 2015, 10:12 a.m. March 29, 2017, 9:16 a.m.
1 Howick Brass Luke Christiansen
2 Kumeu Brass Mark Close
3 North Shore Brass Academy Trevor Clark
